posts.post_title: FS: One copy of the OJ Bible
posts.post_content:
I have a copy of the OJ bible that can be yours for only $55.  It will be sent to you via USPS book rate postage.  It has the jacket in very good condition as well.

If interested, email at [url]rgncubs@att.net[/url]
